================================================================================
NEXT STEPS
================================================================================

1. Review the issues listed above
2. For each hardcoded text, add a translation key
3. For missing domains, add explicit domain parameters
4. For untranslated attributes, use {{ 'key'|trans() }} syntax

Example fixes:
  Before: <h1>Dashboard</h1>
  After:  <h1>{{ 'dashboard.title'|trans({}, 'dashboard') }}</h1>

  Before: title="Click here"
  After:  title="{{ 'common.click_here'|trans({}, 'messages') }}"
